item.title: FreeNode IRC #indieweb-dev on DID's
item.description: Link to #indieweb-dev Channel Matrix bridge to #dev channnel chat (via riot.im) Link to the rest of this Chat-log 16:14 sandhawke - I don’t think I have that level of interest to attend IIW - but I happen to be at RWoT right now, and that seems like a sweet spot for me to work on while I’m here. I just made this: 16:14 sandhawke - https://docs.
